description: Episode of Series "Planning for Teaching". A teacher in primary school tells of some of her own experiences in making learning more effective. In her class, teacher and pupil work together on the basic skills such as reading and writing. But stronger motivation for learning is derived from unit study projects, which also give pupils opportunities to develop social skills.
